about.description_p1: With faith, dedication, and teamwork, we transform lives every day.
about.description_p2: Through the commitment of our staff, volunteers, and friends, we provide care, education, and support to children, youth, and the elderly.
about.description_p3: Every contribution — whether time, resources, or prayer — helps us build a future with more dignity and compassion.

volunteers.description: Being a volunteer means dedicating time and talent to transform lives. At Lar Evangélico Português, every gesture counts  we help children, youth, and the elderly with love, faith, and solidarity. Join us and be part of this mission of hope and change.

purpose.title: Serving with Purpose

excellence.title: Excellence with Impact
excellence.description: We strive to be a reference institution, recognized for quality and contribution to social development.

values.title: Values that Inspire
